Description: Everyone has to make a break at least every 150min
A break has to be between 5-25min
If storedDrinks under 300 refill Drinks in the next 5min
If Lilly wants to make a break there have to be more than 400 drinks
Paul gives 200 free drinks away every 3 hours
EmptyBottles have to be put away at least every 50min
After washing Glasses they need 20min to dry
You have 15min to pick up cleaned and dry glasses
Paul and Lilly dont like each other so no break together
Paul loves Juli so when she does a break he does one two
